trans-unit.source: Creates a new HTTP client from a URI, yields it to the block and closes the client afterwards. Parses the host, port, and tls configuration from the URI provided. Port defaults to 80 if not specified unless using the https protocol, which defaults to port 443 and sets tls to true.
trans-unit.target: 从URI创建一个新的HTTP客户端，将其生成到块中，然后关闭该客户端。从提供的URI 解析host，port和tls配置。如果未指定，则端口默认为80（除非使用https协议），该协议默认为端口443并将tls设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new HTTP client with the given host, port and tls configurations. If no port is given, the default one will be used depending on the tls arguments: 80 for if tls is false, 443 if tls is truthy. If tls is true a new OpenSSL::SSL::Context::Client will be used, else the given one. In any case the active context can be accessed through #tls.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的host，port和tls配置创建一个新的HTTP客户端。如果没有端口给定，默认的将取决于使用TLS参数：80如果TLS是 false ，443如果TLS是truthy。如果tls为 true ,则将使用新的 OpenSSL::SSL::Context::Client ，否则使用给定的OpenSSL :: SSL :: Context :: Client。无论如何，都可以通过 #tls 访问活动上下文。

trans-unit.source: Crystal allows you to bind to existing C libraries without writing a single line in C.

trans-unit.source: Crystal can generate documentation from comments using a subset of Markdown.
trans-unit.target: Crystal可以使用Markdown的子集从注释生成文档。

trans-unit.source: Crystal comes with a fully-featured spec library in the Spec module. It provides a structure for writing executable examples of how your code should behave.

trans-unit.source: Crystal has a built-in testing library. Use it!
trans-unit.target: Crystal具有内置的测试库。用它！

trans-unit.source: Crystal has Channels inspired by CSP. They allow communicating data between fibers without sharing memory and without having to worry about locks, semaphores or other special structures.
trans-unit.target: Crystal具有受CSP启发的频道。它们允许在光纤之间传递数据，而无需共享内存，也不必担心锁，信号量或其他特殊结构。

trans-unit.source: Crystal is a programming language with the following goals:
trans-unit.target: Crystal是一种编程语言,其目标如下。

trans-unit.source: Crystal is available as a compiled package. However, it might not be the most recent version available.
trans-unit.target: Crystal 是作为一个编译包提供的。然而,它可能不是最新的版本。

trans-unit.source: Crystal is still under heavy development. There can be breaking changes but we're trying to keep them as minimum as possible.
trans-unit.target: 水晶仍在大力开发中。可能会有一些突破性的变化,但我们会尽量减少这些变化。

trans-unit.source: Crystal is typically accompanied by Shards, its dependency manager.
trans-unit.target: Crystal通常伴随着它的依赖管理器Shards。

trans-unit.source: Crystal provides a few pseudo-constants which provide reflective data about the source code being executed.
trans-unit.target: Crystal提供了一些伪常数,这些伪常数提供了关于正在执行的源代码的反射数据。

trans-unit.source: Crystal provides basic methods to do type reflection, casting and introspection.
trans-unit.target: 水晶提供了基本的方法来进行类型反射、铸造和内省。

trans-unit.source: Crystal provides several literals for creating values of some basic types.
trans-unit.target: Crystal 提供了几个用于创建一些基本类型的值的字元。

trans-unit.source: Crystal structs marked with the @[Extern] attribute
trans-unit.target: 标有 @[Extern] 属性的水晶结构

trans-unit.source: Crystal supports a basic form of cross compilation.
trans-unit.target: Crystal支持交叉编译的基本形式。

trans-unit.source: Crystal supports a number of operators, with one, two or three operands.
trans-unit.target: Crystal支持许多操作数,有一个、两个或三个操作数。

trans-unit.source: Crystal supports an additional literal for arrays and array-like types. It consists of the name of the type followed by a list of elements enclosed in curly braces ({}) and individual elements separated by a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: Crystal支持数组和类似数组的类型的附加文字。它由类型名称组成，后跟用大括号（ {} ）括起来的元素列表以及用逗号（ , ）分隔的单个元素。

trans-unit.source: Crystal supports an additional literal for hashes and hash-like types. It consists of the name of the type followed by a list of comma separated key-value pairs enclosed in curly braces ({}).
trans-unit.target: Crystal支持用于散列和类似哈希的类型的附加文字。它由类型名称组成，后跟用大括号（ {} ）括起来的逗号分隔键/值对列表。

trans-unit.source: Crystal's built-in code formatter can be used not just to format your code, but also to format code samples included in documentation blocks.
trans-unit.target: Crystal内置的代码格式化器不仅可以用来格式化您的代码,还可以用来格式化文档块中包含的代码样本。

trans-unit.source: Crystal's built-in testing library. It provides a structure for writing executable examples of how your code should behave. A domain specific language allows you to write them in a way similar to natural language.
trans-unit.target: Crystal的内置测试库。它提供了一种结构,用于编写可执行的例子,说明你的代码应该如何表现。特定领域的语言允许您以类似于自然语言的方式编写它们。

trans-unit.source: Crystal's philosophy is to require as few type restrictions as possible. However, some restrictions are required.
trans-unit.target: Crystal的理念是要求尽可能少的类型限制。然而,一些限制是必须的。

trans-unit.source: Crystal's way to do error handling is by raising and rescuing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Crystal做错误处理的方式是通过引发和拯救异常。

trans-unit.source: Disables all session ticket generation for this context. Tickets are used to resume earlier sessions more quickly, but in TLS 1.3 if the client connects, sends data, and closes the connection unidirectionally, the server connects, then sends a ticket after the connect handshake, the ticket send can fail with Broken Pipe. So if you have that kind of behavior (clients that never read) call this method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用此上下文的所有会话票据生成。票据是用来更快的恢复之前的会话的,但是在TLS 1.3中,如果客户端连接,发送数据,单向关闭连接,服务器连接,然后在连接握手后发送票据,票据发送可能会失败与Broken Pipe。所以如果你有这种行为(客户端从不读取)就调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: Due to the concurrent nature of this macro, it is highly recommended to handle any exceptions within the concurrent calls. trans-unit.source: Each of the above kinds of variables will be explained later on.
trans-unit.target: 以上每一种变量将在后面解释。

trans-unit.source: Each of these methods returns the Socket::Address that was added to this server.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法中的每一个都返回添加到此服务器的 Socket::Address 。

trans-unit.source: Each one of them is optional, so a method can do without the double splat, without the splat, without keyword arguments and without positional arguments.
trans-unit.target: 每一个都是可选的,所以一个方法可以不需要双拼,不需要拼写,不需要关键词参数,不需要位置参数。

trans-unit.source: Each parameter defines a set, the character is matched against the intersection of those, in other words it needs to match all sets.
trans-unit.target: 每个参数都定义了一个集合,字符要与这些集合的交点进行匹配,换句话说,它需要匹配所有的集合。

trans-unit.source: Each time is attached to a specific time zone, represented by a Location (see #location). #zone returns the time zone observed in this location at the current time (i.e. the instant represented by this Time). #offset returns the offset of the current zone in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 每次时间都附加到由 Location 表示的特定时区（请参阅 #location ）。 #zone 返回当前时间在该位置观察到的时区（即this Time 表示的时刻）。 #offset 以秒为单位返回当前区域的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Embedded Crystal (ECR) is a template language for embedding Crystal code into other text, that includes but is not limited to HTML. The template is read and transformed at compile time and then embedded into the binary.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式水晶(ECR)是一种模板语言,用于将水晶代码嵌入到其他文本中,包括但不限于HTML。该模板在编译时被读取和转换,然后嵌入到二进制中。

trans-unit.source: Embeds an ECR file filename into the program and appends the content to an IO in the variable io_name.
trans-unit.target: 将ECR文件文件名嵌入程序中，并将内容附加到变量io_name中的IO上。

trans-unit.source: Embeds an ECR file filename into the program and renders it to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将ECR文件的文件名嵌入程序，并将其呈现为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Emits a CDATA section. Escapes nested CDATA end sequences.
trans-unit.target: 发出一个 CDATA 节。转义嵌套的 CDATA 结束序列。

trans-unit.source: Emits a logs entry with a message, and data attached to
trans-unit.target: 发出带有信息的日志条目,并将数据附加到

trans-unit.source: Emits a string formated according to RFC 3339 (ISO 8601 profile).
trans-unit.target: 发出根据RFC 3339（ISO 8601配置文件）格式化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Emits an alias to the given anchor.
trans-unit.target: 对给定的锚点发出别名。

trans-unit.source: Emits an attribute with namespace info and a value.
trans-unit.target: 发出带有名称空间信息和值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Emits an element with namespace info with the given attributes.
trans-unit.target: 发出具有给定属性的名称空间信息的元素。

trans-unit.source: Emits an element with the given attributes.
trans-unit.target: 发出具有给定属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: Emits the entry to the given io. It uses the #formatter to convert.
trans-unit.target: 发出给定io的条目。它使用 #formatter 进行转换。
